name: Star Thief
description:
The Milky Way, year 4036. Humanity has taken flight in space for 1500 years now, and has colonized a large part of the galaxy. Browse the space aboard your ship, visit planets more dangerous than each other!

    DISCOVER [/ h2]
    The universe is not the same as 1000 years ago. The UN has lost control of the galaxy. Decide to loot or restore order, it's up to you! [/ list]
      CRAFT[/ h2] [/ list]
      Use a state-of-the-art crafting system and build disproportionately powerful tools!
        IT'S ALL FOR THE MOMENT [/ h2] [/ list]
        Yeah well it's good it's not bad
